title: query-payment-plans

This endpoint searches for all payment plans created under a business based on the parameters passed in the request. All parameters are optional. 
Queries do not return canceled or deleted payment plans. 
 
## The request Query your payment plans by sending a **POST** API request to the URI below. ### Endpoint live <pre class="api-header-long-url"><p class="api-header"><span class="post-tag">POST</span>https://api2.checkout.com/v2/recurringPayments/plans/search</p></pre> ### Endpoint sandbox <pre class="api-header-long-url"><p class="api-header"><span class="post-tag">POST</span>https://sandbox.checkout.com/api2/v2/recurringPayments/plans/search</p></pre> ### Header and path parameters 
x    
Add Row Add Col
`Authorization` <span class="req-def">Required</span> 
`secret key`* 
`Content-Type` <span class="req-def">Required</span> 
`application/json` 
*For authorization, use the valid `secret key` of your Checkout.com account. You can find this in [The Hub](https://hub.checkout.com/). ### Request example 
Shell
rename Â· delete 
xxxxxxxxxx
15
 
1
curl https://sandbox.checkout.com/api2/v2/recurringPayments/plans/search
2
    -H "Authorization: sk_test_55aedccc-7f53-4ccc-b0a6-d943decc3c31"
3
    -H "Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8"
4
    -X POST
5
    -d '{
6
        "fromDate":"2015-11-05T13:10:30Z",
7
        "toDate":"2015-11-05T13:10:30Z",
8
        "offset":1,
9
        "count":10,
10
        "name": "Silver Monthly subscription",
11
        "planTrackId": "109lk123lkj1l3",
12
        "autoCapTime": 48,
13
        "value": 3995,
14
        "status": 1
15
    }'

## Additional parameters  
x    
Add Row Add Col
`autoCapTime` <span class="field-type">Decimal</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Set the delayed capture time in hours. Use values 0 to 168 (0 to 7 days). <span class="table-info">For more precise timings, use decimals: eg., 0.5 = 30 mins.</span> 
`count` <span class="field-type">Integer</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Number of records to return. <span class="table-info">Default is 10.</span> 
`currency` <span class="field-type">String</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Three-letter ISO currency code representing the currency of the payment. 
`fromDate` <span class="field-type">String</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Start date in UTC date and time (based on ISO 8601 profile). Format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` (e.g., `2015-11-05T13:00:00Z` or `2015-11-05T08:00:00-05:00`). 
`name` <span class="field-type">String</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
The name of the payment plan as displayed in The Hub and attached to the customer. Maximum characters: 100. 
`offset` <span class="field-type">Integer</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
A cursor used for paging. <span class="table-info">Default is 1. (eg:, if count=10 and offset=2, then records 11 to 20 returned)</span> 
`planTrackId` <span class="field-type">String</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Unique identifier for the recurring plan set by the Merchant. Maximum characters: 50. 
`status` <span class="field-type">Integer</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
Defines the status of the recurring payment plan. It is used for the endpoint that will allow monitoring of the health of a recurring plan. Possible returned values: * 0, "Failed Initial" : The transaction in the main charge request failed or was declined. * 1, "Active" : Active recurring payment plan, response if the transaction / payment plan is successful * 2, "Cancelled" : Cancelled (via API or the Hub) * 3, "In Arrears" : The recurring transactions failed. * 4, "Suspended" : Merchant paused the service. Or If retries also failed. * 5, "Completed" : Recurring payment plan completed. 
`toDate` <span class="field-type">String</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
End date in UTC date and time (based on ISO 8601 profile). Format: `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` (e.g., `2015-11-05T13:00:00Z` or `2015-11-05T08:00:00-05:00`). 
`value` <span class="field-type">Integer</span> <span class="optional-def">Optional</span> 
he value of the payment as a non-zero positive integer (no decimals). <span class="table-info">[Find out more](doc:calculating-the-value)</span> 
--- ## The response If a paginated payment plan object returns, then your request was successful. If you're having problems with this API, then ask our [support team](mailto:support@checkout.com) for help. ### Response example Take a look at the example response below.  
rename Â· delete
